comment.p: Both dats were generated using DatUtil (with sorting switched on) and are intended for:

li.p: Users of MAME32 (where listinfo is not available)
CMPro users of MAME (if they haven't compiled in my sample fix)
Anyone who uses RomCenter (you must use this dat for correct behaviour)

revision.comment: Updated CMPro dat to contain correct sample information (used my sample fix).
Added v0.36 dats for CMPro and RomCenter.
